entries.title: Jofra Archer: England bowler to have surgery on elbow injury
entries.summary: England fast bowler Jofra Archer will have surgery on his troublesome right elbow on Friday - with a timeframe on his recovery yet to be given.

entries.title: Home nations openers to be shown live on BBC - how to follow Euro 2020
entries.summary: The BBC will give audiences 24/7 access to all of the action, analysis, insight and entertainment from this summer's European Championship.
